page.title: 17A TYPICAL SCHOOLDAY
page.content:
I get up at 7a.m.After washing, dressing I eat my breakfast with my brothers and sisters.At 10.30a.m.I eat the 2 packets of crisps I bought in school.I have my dinner in school.We have a cafeteria system.We can buy what we want.Chips cost 20p,a sausage cost 10p,an orange or lemon drink cost 9p,milk cost 6p,yoghurt cost 12p,a beefburger bap cost 20p.I usually spend 60p a day on my dinner.We have an hour for our dinner. My mother has
my tea ready when I go home.My favourite tea is sausage,beans and chips.I watch television after tea and usually go to play with my friend. We usually play at the swings.I take my 2 dogs with me.One is an alasation.The other is a sheepdog.I go in at 9p.m. and feed the dogs before I go to bed.My sister has a pet rabbit.
